content.text: Hi there!
Hello!
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to edit, watch tv, and play games.
I like to watch tv too! What are your favorite shows?
I like The Walking Dead, Breaking Bad, and The Office.
Me too! I love The Walking Dead. What's your favorite season?
I think my favorite season is season 5. It was really intense and had a lot of great character development.
I agree! I loved how they introduced the new characters and how the story unfolded.
Me too! It was so well done. What about you, what's your favorite season?
I think my favorite season is season 7. It was so exciting and had a lot of great twists and turns.
I agree! I loved how they killed off Glenn and Abraham. It was so unexpected.
Me too! It was so shocking. What do you think of the new season?
I think it's been really good so far. I love the new characters and the story is really interesting.
Me too! I'm excited to see what happens next.
Me too! It's going to be a lot of fun.
I'm glad we have the same taste in tv shows!
Me too! It makes it more fun to talk about them.
So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I like to play games too. I play a lot of video games and board games.
I like video games too! What are your favorite games?
I like a lot of different games, but my favorites are probably The Last of Us, Red Dead Redemption 2, and Persona 5.
I've heard good things about all of those games! I've been meaning to check them out.
You definitely should! They're all great games. What about you, what are your favorite games?
I like a lot of different games too, but my favorites are probably The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild, Super Mario Odyssey, and Hollow Knight.
I've heard good things about all of those games too! I've been meaning to check them out.
You definitely should! They're all great games.
